name: Boka's
description: Servings and prices are great. The restaurant specializes in sea food. The parking is awesome. The service is really good. The view at this restaurant is amazing. There is always a table available, as the place is gigantic, like the servings. It is pretty quiet, all year round. The a-la-carte servings also come with an all you can eat salad buffet. Did I mention the servings sizes?

name: Camarão Dourado
description: For those who are in the Ingleses beach region and want to try the shrimp sequence, here is a great option! It includes a lot of food and the value is very good. It’s all very tasty. The service is above average comparing to other location in the same area. The food can take a while to reach your table.

name: Glouton
description:
Do not miss this restaurant. One of the best dining experiences ever, definitely top in Brazil.
Unpretentious, delicious food with beautiful presentation in a beautiful setting, friendly staff. Way beyond my expectations based on prior reviews. This should be at least a 2 star Michelin restaurant. Must dine here if in Belo Horizonte.
